name: Dungeon Master 2: The Legend of Skullkeep
name_original: Dungeon Master 2: The Legend of Skullkeep
description:
Dungeon Master 2: The Legend of Skullkeep is a RPG game developed by FTL Games. It was originally released in 1995. Interplay Productions published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Dungeon Master 2: The Legend of Skullkeep on PC.
